summary: Allows the player to marry From-Deepest-Fathoms (Argonian in Riften)
descriptionHtml:
This mod should now work with Hearthfire, as of version 2.0 (July 2014). It is no longer necessary to complete FDF's quest beforehand (though I suggest you do so anyway, I can't guarantee that there won't be problems otherwise).

You could also try to use this mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52156/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D52156%26preview%3D&pUp=1 I'm not sure if it works with FDM but it's worth a shot.

(MINOR SPOILERS)

This mod makes From-Deepest-Fathoms just like any other marriable NPC.

Note that a lot of other mods for extending marriage don't work with FDF due to issues with voice files (using the in-game console doesn't work either). This mod gets around that (and uses the same voice as the other marriable Argonian female - the one in Windhelm).
author: NeasOlc
